sentences.chinese: 穰侯魏冉者，秦昭王母宣太后弟也。
sentences.literal: Wei Ran, Marquis of Rang, was the younger brother of Empress Dowager Xuan, mother of King Zhao of Qin.
His ancestors were Chu people of the Mi clan.

sentences.chinese: 秦武王卒，無子，立其弟為昭王。
sentences.literal: When King Wu of Qin died without sons, his younger brother was established as King Zhao.

sentences.chinese: 昭王母故號為羋八子，及昭王即位，羋八子號為宣太后。
sentences.literal: King Zhao's mother was formerly titled Lady Mi the Eighth. When King Zhao ascended the throne, Lady Mi the Eighth was honored as Empress Dowager Xuan.
Empress Dowager Xuan was not King Wu's mother.

sentences.chinese: 武王母號曰惠文后，先武王死。
sentences.literal: King Wu's mother was honored as Empress Huiwen and passed away before King Wu.

sentences.chinese: 同父弟曰羋戎，為華陽君。
sentences.literal: her younger full brother was Mi Rong, who served as Lord of Huayang.

sentences.chinese: 而昭王同母弟曰高陵君、涇陽君。
sentences.literal: King Zhao's full younger brothers were titled Lord of Gaoling and Lord of Jingyang.

sentences.chinese: 而魏冉最賢，自惠王、武王時任職用事。
sentences.literal: Wei Ran was the most capable of them. He held office and managed affairs from the time of King Hui and King Wu onward.

sentences.chinese: 武王卒，諸弟爭立，唯魏冉力為能立昭王。
sentences.literal: When King Wu died, his younger brothers contended for the throne. Only Wei Ran exerted his strength to establish King Zhao.

sentences.chinese: 昭王即位，以冉為將軍，衛咸陽。
sentences.literal: When King Zhao ascended the throne, he appointed Ran as general to guard Xianyang.

sentences.chinese: 誅季君之亂，而逐武王后出之魏，昭王諸兄弟不善者皆滅之，威振秦國。
sentences.literal: He executed the rebellion of Ji Jun, expelled King Wu's empress to Wei, and exterminated all of King Zhao's disloyal brothers. His might shook the state of Qin.

sentences.chinese: 昭王少，宣太后自治，任魏冉為政。
sentences.literal: Since King Zhao was young, Empress Dowager Xuan governed personally and employed Wei Ran to conduct political affairs.

sentences.chinese: 昭王七年，樗里子死，而使涇陽君質於齊。
sentences.literal: In King Zhao's seventh year, Shu Lizi died, and Lord Jingyang was sent as hostage to Qi.

sentences.chinese: 趙人樓緩來相秦，趙不利，乃使仇液之秦，請以魏冉為秦相。
sentences.literal: The Zhao man Lou Huan came to serve as chancellor of Qin. This disadvantaged Zhao, so they sent Qiu Ye to Qin to request that Wei Ran be made chancellor of Qin.
